DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether N2O ( laugh gas ) antinociceptive effect healthy volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Acute Treatment With N2O Inhibitory Pain Mechanisms Healthy Subject
DOC.detailed_description: 10 healthy volunteer come twice pain medicine unit , 1 visit 'll get N2O second visit 'll get air placebo , wo n't know 're get . During visit 'll get heat stimulus use QST report pain use eVAS ( scale 0 100 0 pain 100 bad pain imagine ) .
DOC.criteria: 1850 year old woman men healthy smoker medication use pregnant woman cardiovascular disease
